member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.ImageProcessingMode
member.summary: Specifies available modes of image processing.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.ImageProcessingMode.Normal
member.summary: Optimal image processing.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.ImageProcessingMode.Fast
member.summary: Fast image processing.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.ImageProcessingMode.Advanced
member.summary: Advanced image processing.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode
member.summary: Specifies available blending modes.
member.remarks: use this enum.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Normal
member.summary: Selects the source color, ignoring the backdrop.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Multiply
member.summary: Multiplies the backdrop and source color values.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Screen
member.summary: Multiplies the complements of the backdrop and source color values, then complements the result.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Overlay
member.summary: Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the backdrop color value. Source colors overlay the backdrop while preserving its highlights and shadows. The backdrop color is not replaced but is mixed with the source color to reflect the lightness or darkness of the backdrop.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Darken
member.summary: Selects the darker of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Lighten
member.summary: Selects the lighter of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.ColorDodge
member.summary: Brightens the backdrop color to reflect the source color. Painting with black produces no changes.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.ColorBurn
member.summary: Darkens the backdrop color to reflect the source color. Painting with white produces no change.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.HardLight
member.summary: Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the source color value. The effect is similar to shining a harsh spotlight on the backdrop.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.SoftLight
member.summary: Darkens or lightens the colors, depending on the source color value. The effect is similar to shining a diffused spotlight on the backdrop

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Difference
member.summary: Subtracts the darker of the two constituent colors from the lighter color.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Exclusion
member.summary: Produces an effect similar to that of the Difference mode but lower in contrast. Painting with white inverts the backdrop color; painting with black produces no change.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Hue
member.summary: Creates a color with the hue of the source color and the saturation and luminosity of the backdrop color.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Saturation
member.summary: Creates a color with the saturation of the source color and the hue and luminosity of the backdrop color. Painting with this mode in an area of the backdrop that is a pure gray (no saturation) produces no change.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Color
member.summary: Creates a color with the hue and saturation of the source color and the luminosity of the backdrop color. This preserves the gray levels of the backdrop and is useful for coloring monochrome images or tinting color images.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Luminosity
member.summary: Creates a color with the luminosity of the source color and the hue and saturation of the backdrop color. This produces an inverse effect to that of the Color mode.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Brightness
member.summary: Selects the brightness of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Contrast
member.summary: Selects the contrast of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Gamma
member.summary: Selects the gamma of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Min
member.summary: Selects the min of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Max
member.summary: Selects the max of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Sum
member.summary: Sum of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Sub
member.summary: Sub of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.BlendingMode.Division
member.summary: Divides the backdrop and source color values.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this command is nested into another command.
member.remarks: If true, image will not be checked for image-processing status, and some internal work will not execute.
member.example: Depending on destination pixel format, executes different convert commands, which are Nested into parent command (ConvertCommand).

member.summary: Gets a list of supported native pixel formats for this processing command.

member.summary: Gets a list of supported pixel formats for this processing command.
member.value: Supported pixel formats: PixelFormat.BlackWhite, PixelFormat.Indexed1, PixelFormat.Indexed4, PixelFormat.Indexed8, PixelFormat.Gray8, PixelFormat.Gray16, PixelFormat.Bgr555, PixelFormat.Bgr565, PixelFormat.Bgr24, PixelFormat.Bgr48, PixelFormat.Bgr32, PixelFormat.Bgra32, PixelFormat.Bgra64.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.ProcessingCommandBase.Results
member.summary: Sets the results of previously executed commands, current command can use results if necessary. Gets the results of execution of this command after execution of the command.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.ProcessingCommandBase.IsCanceled

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.IntermediateImageRequestEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event which invoked when intermediate image can be created.
member.remarks:
Here is a sequence of steps for intermediate image creation:
Vector decoder during image rendering raises an event when intermediate image can be created
Renderer sets value of property if intermediate image must be created
Vector decoder creates intermediate image and invokes delegate specified by property if value of property is not null.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.IntermediateImageRequestEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate which invoked for getting the intermediate image.
member.remarks:
Here is a sequence of steps for intermediate image creation:
Vector decoder during image rendering raises an event when intermediate image can be created
Renderer sets value of property if intermediate image must be created
Vector decoder creates intermediate image and invokes delegate specified by property if value of property is not null.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Image size, in megapixels, when image must be rendered.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.ImageSizeRenderingRequirement.ImageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets an image size, in megapixels, when image must be rendered.
member.remarks:
Default size of image, in megapixels, for standard codecs:
BMP - 50 Megapixels
TIFF - 50 Megapixels
PNG - 50 Megapixels
JPEG - 50 Megapixels
JPEG2000 - 0.5 Megapixels
Image will be rendered (loaded by parts) if image size is more or equal than value of this property; image will NOT be rendered (loaded as one block) if image size is less than value of this property.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.ImageSizeRenderingRequirement.IsRenderingRequired(Vintasoft.Imaging.Metadata.PageMetadata)
member.summary: Determines that image must be rendered.
member.returns: true if image must be rendered (loaded by parts); false if image must be loaded (loaded as one block).

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.ImageRenderingTask.VectorRenderingQualityFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality factor for vector rendering.
member.value:
1 - the image renderer will render image with specified resolution and provide image with normal quality.
value greater than 1 and less than or equal to 2 - the image renderer will render image with increased resolution and provide image with high quality. Image renderer will use more memory.
Default value is 1.

member.value: Value from 1 to .MaxThreads.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the intermediate image must be rendered.
member.value:
true - intermediate image will be created and event will be fired when intermediate image is ready; false - intermediate image is not created.

member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in milliseconds, when intermediate image is created.
member.remarks: This property has effect only for vector image.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether event must be invoked in a thread which started the rendering task.
member.value:
true - event will be invoked in a thread which started the rendering task; false - event will be invoked in a thread which renders image.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the progressive decoding of image is enabled.
member.remarks:
This property has effect only if is set to true.
Progressive decoding means that a low-quality image is rendered before the original image is rendered.

member.summary: Get or sets the mode of progressive decoding.
member.value: Default value is ProgressiveDecodingMode.Fast.

member.summary: Gets or sets the depth of progressive decoding.
member.value:
N - count of progressive images (steps) to generate.
Default value is 1.
member.remarks: 2 progressive images (with scale (25/4=6)% and (100/4=25)%) will be generated and the source image will be rendered if value of this property is set to 2 and value of the property is set to 4.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.ImageRenderingTask.ProgressiveDecodingScaleFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets a scale factor for progressive image on one step.
member.value:
N (from 2 to int.MaxValue) - progressive image has quality N times less than image on next step.
Default value is 4.
member.remarks: 2 progressive images (with scale (25/4=6)% and (100/4=25)%) will be generated and the source image will be rendered if value of the property is set to 2 and value of this property is set to 4.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageRendering.ImageRenderingTask.ProgressiveDecodingRenderingQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering quality for progressive image rendering.
member.value: Default value is ImageRenderingQuality.Normal.

member.remarks:
This property affects to the property.
The property defines the scale factor for the maximum distance between the neighbour symbols. The neighbour symbols will be added into the same region if distance between symbols is less than the maximum distance. The neighbour symbols will be added into the different regions if distance between symbols is greater than the maximum distance.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Text.TextRegionLine.SelectionSpaceFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the selection space factor.
member.value: Default value is 6.
member.remarks:
This property affects to the property.
The property defines the scale factor for the maximum distance between the neighbour symbols. The neighbour symbols will be added into the same region if distance between symbols is less than the maximum distance. The neighbour symbols will be added into the different regions if distance between symbols is greater than the maximum distance.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Text.TextRegionLine.SelectionRegion
member.summary: Gets a selection region of this line.
member.remarks:
The property returns one region.
The property returns several regions. Each region presents a group of symbols. Symbols are grouped if they have the same size and they are standing very close.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Text.TextRegionLine.SelectionRegions
member.summary: Gets a selection regions of this line.
member.remarks:
The property returns one region.
The property returns several regions. Each region presents a group of symbols. Symbols are grouped if they have the same size and they are standing very close.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat
member.summary: Specifies the format of the color data for each pixel in the image.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Undefined
member.summary: Undefined pixel format.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Indexed1
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel format is 1 bit per pixel and that it uses indexed color. The color table therefore has two colors in it.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.BlackWhite
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel format is 1 bit per pixel and that it uses two colors: black and white.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Indexed4
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 4 bits per pixel, indexed.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Indexed8
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 8 bits per pixel, indexed. The color table therefore has 256 colors in it.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Gray8
member.summary: The pixel format is 8 bits per pixel. The color information specifies 256 shades of gray.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgr555
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 15 bits per pixel; 5 bits each are used for the blue, green, and red components.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgr565
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 16 bits per pixel; 5-6-5 bits each are used for the blue, green, and red components.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Gray16
member.summary: The pixel format is 16 bits per pixel. The color information specifies 65536 shades of gray.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgr24
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 24 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green, and red components.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgr32
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green and red components. The remaining 8 bits are not used.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgra32
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green, red and alpha components.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgr48
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 48 bits per pixel; 16 bits each are used for the blue, green, and red components.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.PixelFormat.Bgra64
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 64 bits per pixel; 16 bits each are used for the blue, green, red and alpha components.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of images.
member.remarks:
Class allows to:
add/insert any number of image files to the collection
add/insert all pages of multipage GIF/JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file to the collection
add/insert any number of an objects to the collection
swap images in the collection
remove image(s) from the collection
save all images of collection to multipage JBIG2/TIFF file or PDF document asynchronously or synchronously

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection.SaveSync(System.String)
member.summary: Saves synchronously all images from this collection to specified multipage image (JBIG2/PDF/TIFF) file.
member.param: Filename where the image collection should be saved.
member.exception: Thrown if filename is null.
Thrown if another saving process is executing at this moment.
Thrown if error occurs at saving the image.
member.remarks:
This method works synchronously.
Supported image formats: JBIG2, PDF, TIFF.
Suitable encoder is selected automatically from the extension of the filename, exception is thrown if encoder is not found for file extension specified in filename.
This method
saves images to new JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file specified by filename
file specified by filename is overwritten if it exists
saving process can be canceled, saving of images can be suppressed
sources of images in the image collection are not changed, i.e. images[i].SourceInfo.Filename is not changed
if
filename != images[0]..SourceInfo.Filename
is false
createNewFile is true
This method
saves images to new JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file specified by filename
file specified by filename is overwritten if it exists, value of the createNewFile parameter is ignored
saving process cannot be canceled, saving of images cannot be suppressed
sources of images in the image collection are changed, i.e. images[i].SourceInfo.Filename is changed to filename
if
filename != images[0]..SourceInfo.Filename
is true
This method
changes images in the source JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if some images of source file are changed in the image collection
removes images from the source JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if some images of source file are removed from the image collection
adds images to the source JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if some images of NOT from the source file are added to the image collection
reindex images in the source JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if images are reindexed in the image collection
file specified by filename is overwritten if it exists, value of the createNewFile parameter is ignored
saving process cannot be canceled, saving of images cannot be suppressed
sources of images in the image collection is changed, i.e. images[i].SourceInfo.Filename is changed to filename
if
filename == images[0]..SourceInfo.Filename
is true
This method
throw an exception
if
filename == images[0]..SourceInfo.Filename
is false
event will occur before saving of each image. In this event you can get information about the image, suppress image saving or cancel image saving process.
event will occur after saving of each image. In this event you can get information about progress of images saving process or cancel image saving process.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage
member.summary: Contains information about a raster or vector image.
member.remarks:
Image can be loaded from file, stream or bitmap. The following formats are supported:
BMP
DICOM (VintaSoft DICOM .NET Plug-in is necessary)
DOCX (VintaSoft Office .NET Plug-in is necessary)
EMF
RAW (DNG, CR2, CRW, NEF, NRW)
GIF, animated GIF
Icon
JBIG2 (VintaSoft JBIG2 .NET Plug-in is necessary)
JPEG
JPEG-LS
JPEG2000 (VintaSoft JPEG2000 .NET Plug-in is necessary)
PCX
PDF (VintaSoft PDF .NET Plug-in is necessary)
PNG
TIFF
WMF
Important: Only the first image will be accessible if the source image is a multipage file or image. The class must be used if all images of multipage image should be accessed.
The following image parameters can be get without reading image data:
width
height
pixel format
bits per pixel
palette
resolution
Image can be saved to file or stream. The following formats are supported:
BMP
GIF
JBIG2 (VintaSoft JBIG2 .NET Plug-in is necessary)
JPEG
JPEG2000 (VintaSoft JPEG2000 .NET Plug-in is necessary)
PCX
PDF (VintaSoft PDF .NET Plug-in is necessary)
PNG
TIFF

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage.CreateImageBasedOnSourceImageDecoder(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage)
member.summary: Creates a new image that is based on the decoder of the source image.
member.returns: A new image based on the decoder of the source image.
member.remarks:
This method can be used when the same must be used with different decoding (color management) settings.
Created image must be destroyed using the method when image is not necessary any more.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage.CreateImagesBasedOnSourceImageDecoders(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage[])
member.summary: Creates a new array of images that based on decoders of source images.
member.param: An array of the source images.
member.returns: An array of images based on decoders of the source images.
member.remarks:
This method can be used when the same array of objects must be used with different decoding (color management) settings, for example, the same images must be viewed and printed with different color management settings.
Created images must be destroyed using the method when images are not necessary any more.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves this object to the specified file.
member.param: Filename where the image should be saved.
member.exception: Thrown if filename is null.
Thrown if encoder is not found for specified file extension or error occurs at saving the image.
member.remarks:
Supported image formats: BMP, GIF, JBIG2, JPEG, PCX, PDF, PNG, TIFF.
Suitable encoder is selected automatically from the extension of the filename, exception is thrown if encoder is not found for file extension specified in filename.
If image is saving to new file (filename != .Filename) this method:
saves image to new BMP/GIF/JBIG2/JPEG/PCX/PDF/PNG/TIFF file
If image is saving to the source file (filename == .Filename) this method:
saves image to the source BMP/GIF/JBIG2/JPEG/PCX/PDF/PNG/TIFF file if image is changed ( = true) and source file contains only one image
throws an exception if image is saved to the source GIF/JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file, image is changed ( = true) and source file contains some images
throws an exception if image is saved to the source image file and image is not changed ( = false)

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage.Save(System.String,Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.Encoders.EncoderBase)
member.summary: Saves this object to the specified path using specified encoder.
member.param: Filename where the image should be saved.
member.exception: Thrown if filename or encoder is null.
Thrown if error occurs at saving the image.
member.remarks:
Supported image formats: BMP, GIF, JBIG2, JPEG, PCX, PDF, PNG, TIFF.
Suitable encoder is selected automatically from the extension of the filename, exception is thrown if encoder is not found for file extension specified in filename.
If image is saving to new file (filename != .Filename) this method:
saves image to new BMP/GIF/JBIG2/JPEG/PCX/PDF/PNG/TIFF file if .CreateNewFile = true; file specified by filename is replaced if it exists
saves image to new JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if .CreateNewFile = false and file specified by filename is not exist
adds image to new JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if .CreateNewFile = false and file specified by filename is exist
If image is saving to the source file (filename == .Filename) this method:
saves image to the source BMP/GIF/JBIG2/JPEG/PCX/PDF/PNG/TIFF file if image is changed ( = true) and source file contains only one image
throws an exception if image is saved to the source BMP/GIF/JBIG2/JPEG/PCX/PDF/PNG/TIFF file and image is not changed ( = false)
adds image to the source JBIG2/PDF/TIFF file if .CreateNewFile = false, file specified by filename is exist
